properties.title: Blausee
properties.abstract: It's no exaggeration to describe the Blausee lake as fascinating and precious jewel of the Bernese Alps. And the deep-blue lake, with its crystal-clear waters, lies in the idyllic 20 ha large grounds of a traffic-free natural park.
properties.description:
Visitors to the delightful Blausee lake not only discover a jewel situated in a privileged location amidst stunning nature; but also excellent restaurants along with Alpine bio-trout breeding, romantic walks, fun and adventure for children, illuminated parking areas and almost mystic views of the lake at night.

The crystal-clear waters of the lake, with rich mineral content, remain more or less at a constant temperature of around 8ºc both in summer and winter. And this is the source of the tastiest Blausee lake trout – naturally bred biologically.  Fish here thrive and grow in conditions similar to those in the wilds; the results of which are a particularly firm, fleshy and tasty fish.
